raw_body:
ATHUKORALA – RAJAH METHTHANANDA – Son of late Mr & Mrs R.P. Athukorale,​ brother of Sumithra (Australia),​ late Richard,​ late Lieutenant General H.V. Athukorale,​ Enid,​ late Swarna,​ Rani Lakshmie and Susantha (Australia),​ passed away. Remains lie at Jayarathne Funeral Parlour from Friday,​ 8th of March. Cortege leaves Parlour on 9th and Cremation at General Cemetery,​ Borella at 4.00 p.m. The Emperor Apartment 2-2F,​ 75A,​ Galle Road,​ Colombo 03.
016983
